input.sentences: they installed new satellites today for better tv watching
unfortunately they knocked out tv forever | and people started to protest .
the protest grew and became very angry soon .
as the protest grew | war veterans came to assist as non tv watching was considered unamerican .
even the president was getting in on this . do n't knock out tv guys .
output.sentences: Today we were watching the TV reporters with their satellites prepare for the upcoming events of the day.
The TV reporters talked to the protest group before the event started.
As more perople arrived, the crowd grew angry as the protest group started to speak.
Many war veterans watching the events held flags showing their support.
A TV reporter stepped up to the car to knock on the window and get the attention of the President.
